item.description:
When your food comes alive, so do you!

Go beyond basic nutrition to learn the dynamic potential of whole foods to restore and maintain your health naturally.

Dishes to be demonstrated today include refreshing, easy-to-make pressed salad, curried lentils with coconut milk, or “nishime,” lightly steamed chunky vegetables.

Guest teacher and chef Bill Klar will raffling off a two-day cooking class worth $120!

BIO: Chef Bill Klar is a graduate of the French Culinary Institute in New York and the Kushi Institute, the world’s foremost center for macrobiotic studies, in Massachusetts. He has appeared on WTNH TV 8’s Connecticut Style.

Learn more about Bill at http://billklar.com/.

***************************************

Schedule for the evening:

7:15 pm: Delicious Potluck Dinner begins.

7:45 - 9:15 pm: Food Demo and Talk

***************************************

About the potluck dinner:

-Many people have dietary restrictions. Be mindful as you prepare your dish, and list the ingredients on a note card at the event.

-This a zero-waste event. Please bring your own plate, utensils, and water bottle.

***************************************

FREE PARKING! In the back of the ArtSpace building. Ignore "Resident Parking Only" signs. Parking is allowed during this event. Enter through the back entrance by the murals.

***************************************

This event is organized by CT Health Foodies, a supportive community for people interested in healthy eating. This event is part of an ongoing series of monthly potluck dinners held on the second Tuesday of the month at ArtSpace in downtown Hartford. CT Health Foodies is a diverse group, and we respect everyone’s food choices.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through the back entrance by the murals. Walk down the long corridor. At the end of the corridor, on the right, you will see the room where we will be meeting.
item.name: Delicious, Healthy Food Demo by Chef Bill Klar and Potluck Dinner
